extendedInfo.description: Everyone stand up! It's time to dance! Lights flash and stars drift down as the Yo Gabba Gabba! crew do what they do best, DANCE! From the critically acclaimed and publicly adored show "Yo Gabba Gabba!" comes an app that will get you movin'! In this app your favorite characters from the show come to life! Dance with your device or give it a shake to get them glowing! Listening and dancing to music is awesome! DJ Lance Rock claps to the beat! Raise the roof with Brobee! Go Brobee! Foofa pirouettes! Go Foofa! Muno fist-pumps! Go Muno! Plex does the robot! Go Plex! And shuffle with Toodee! Go Toodee! You also get the addictive "Yo Gabba Gabba!" theme song! You can play it anytime to get the party started! That's awesome! So let's break it down with the tall and friendly, the pink and happy, the little green one, the one who likes to have fun, and the magic robot! Go Crazy! Go Crazy! Features... â¢ DJ Lance Rock, Brobee, Foofa, Muno, Plex, and Toodee from "Yo Gabba Gabba!" ! â¢ Dance with your phone to make them glow! â¢ Each character has their own signature moves! â¢ The "Yo Gabba Gabba!" theme song! â¢ Tons of fun! Are you ready?! YEAH!

reviews.title: Good app but...
reviews.comment: Used to be free and had better control of my child not exiting the app. Bad layout, exclamation point and question mark take you out to play store or review. Would have expected better with a child lock too since I now pay for it. Keeps my son happy but I have to always watch out for him leaving the app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good, but needs improvement
reviews.comment: My 18mo old loves this app, however I wish there was a kid mode so she can\'t exit it every 15 seconds. Would have given 5 stars if it did.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awful
reviews.comment: I paid for this App and it opened one time. Now every time I try to open it for my son, it freezes my phone. I WANT A REFUND!!
reviews.author: Laura Farmer

reviews.title: Love it!!
reviews.comment: Great app. Free now, no ads, great gabba songs!! Love!!!!
reviews.author: Gina Crawford

reviews.title: Cute but get rid of Exclamation mark
reviews.comment: My niece keeps hitting the Exclamation mark button. Bad design would be 5 stars if it had that disable. Also help button needs removed hidden also.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Could be better
reviews.comment: Needs to keep phone from sleeping.
reviews.author: Mark Anderson

reviews.comment: My kids went crazy for this app! So cool!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Need to fix
reviews.comment: Keeps shutting off b4 my 3yr old can play it
reviews.author: Richelle Jeremiah

reviews.title: Very cute!
reviews.comment: My nephews love it! Simple and cute.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Simple but fun, great for kids!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Yo gabba gabba
reviews.comment: My daughter absolutely loves this app
